item.title: Kingdom Come (1996)
item.description: body { background-image: url('/img/fiction/kingdom-come-1996.jpg'); } Kingdom Come (1996). Mark Waid; Alex Ross. www.dc.com . www.hoopladigital.com . dc.fandom.com . Accessed Mar 4, 2023. Snapshots The world Wesley left is filled not with his heroes… but with their children and grandchildren. They number in the nameless thousands … progeny of the past, inspired by the legends of those who came before if not the morals.
